title: Remote Growth and Development Education for Nurses

context.prior_knowledge: Basic nursing knowledge and possession of a 3-year nursing degree
context.additional_context: Blended online-offline education designed for working nurses balancing studies and employment.

learning_goals: Learners can explain human growth and development stages from infancy to adolescence via internet-based platforms.
Learners enhance clinical case analysis skills through asynchronous interactions (discussions, feedback) with peers and instructors.
Learners achieve over 80% integration between growth and development theories and practical applications using multimedia content (videos, simulations).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
